oai_dc:dc.dc:title: St. Mary’s Orphanage, Nashville, Tennessee, 1941 October 28
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Students in the gym at St. Mary’s Orphanage and School, October 28, 1941. The 1941 City Directory lists the address of St. Mary’s Orphanage and School at White Bridge Road 6 s Burgie, with Sister Isabell, Superioress. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
